function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Environmental degradation and safety concerns from natural disasters like flooding and extreme heat waves.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on smart sensors and devices leads to privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on advanced technologies introduces vulnerability to cyber attacks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to smart city technologies exacerbates urban safety disparities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to smart city infrastructure and iot devices, leading to potential intrusion and exploitation of personal data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of iot devices and systems due to heterogeneity of protocols, leading to potential interference and security breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring the security and safety of cities due to the combined adoption of safe city and smart city concepts.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased conflicts and crimes due to disparities and deprivations in cities","category":"Social Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of safety and resilience in cities affecting sustainable development","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unauthorized access to surveillance data due to coupling of video surveillance and cloud storage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns arising from the use of surveillance and data extraction technologies in urban developments.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of data breaches and system infiltration in safe city concepts, leading to compromised security of urban systems.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing the safe city concept due to lack of uniformity in protocols and centralized networks, leading to increased complexity and cost.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about private data collection and monitoring in urban areas","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading information and propaganda in the context of safe city projects","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privatization of data collection and delegation to third parties","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and security in the collection and analysis of sensitive and personal data through iot and big data technologies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interconnected smart systems and devices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standards for secure iot device integration and data exchange","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control over data collected by private entities","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of universal standards for data management","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public mistrust of private sector involvement in data management","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data privacy and security measures in smart city infrastructure could lead to unauthorized access to sensitive medical information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between ppps and the actual needs of the cities may lead to ineffective implementation of smart city and safe city projects.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited funding capacity of cities may lead to reliance on ppps, which could introduce challenges in ensuring equity, affordability, and accessibility of smart city and safe city services for all residents.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy, control, and propaganda issues arising from the implementation of smart and safe city concepts.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Security loopholes and threats posed by smart grid, automated building systems, unmanned aerial vehicles, and iot-enabled sensors.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of data leading to espionage and financial exploitation","category":"Data risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of policies, standards, and governance for data usage in smart city concepts","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance from the general public towards the coupling of smart city and safe city concepts.","category":"Social Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty around data usage in the context of public private partnerships ppp for smart and safe city implementation.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential reliance on proprietary technology as an alternative to addressing privacy and security concerns in smart and safe cities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threat to public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of cities through digital technology innovation changes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dependence on
